data.actual_result: Group DM invite's expiration time resets every time the Add Friends to DM modal is opened
data.expected_result: Group DM invite's expiration time doesn't consistently reset every time the Add Friends to DM modal is opened
data.short_description: Re-opening Add Friends to DM modal resets the generated Group DM invite's expiration time
data.steps_to_repro: - Be the owner of a Group DM - Generate an invite by opening the Add Friends to DM modal inside of the Group DM - Right-click the Group DM icon & open the Instant Invites modal - Observe the invite's expiration time resetting every time the Add Friends to DM modal is opened
